article:
A train stopped at a small _ .A man look _ 0f the window and saw a woman _ cakes. People from the train were buying them. The man wanted to _ a cake, but the man was standing far _ the window. It was raining and the man didn't
want to go 0ut in the rain.
Suddenly he saw a boy walking on the platform ,not far from him. _ here, boy!" the man said, ''Do you know how much money we must pay her for a cake?"
"Five cents ,"the boy answered.
Then man gave the boy ten cents and asked him to buy two cakes. "One _ me, and the other one for you," he told the boy.
A few minutes _ the boy came back. He was eating a cake. He gave the man
five cents and said, "There was only one cake."
